segment.source: The Microsoft Surface Hub Readiness Guide will help make sure that your site is ready for the installation.
segment.target: The Microsoft Surface Hub Readiness Guide will help make sure that your site is ready for the installation.

segment.source: The Microsoft Surface Hub Readiness Guide will help make sure that your site is ready for the installation.
segment.target: The Microsoft Surface Hub Readiness Guide will help make sure that your site is ready for the installation.

segment.source: You can download the Guide from the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: You can download the Guide from the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: It includes planning information for both the 55" and 84" devices, as well as info on moving the Surface Hub from receiving to the installation location, mounting options, and a list of what's in the box.
segment.target: It includes planning information for both the 55" and 84" devices, as well as info on moving the Surface Hub from receiving to the installation location, mounting options, and a list of what's in the box.

segment.source: You may also want to check out the Unpacking Guide.
segment.target: You may also want to check out the Unpacking Guide.

segment.source: It will show you how to unpack the devices efficiently and safely.
segment.target: It will show you how to unpack the devices efficiently and safely.

segment.source: There are two guides, one for the 55" and one for the 84".
segment.target: There are two guides, one for the 55" and one for the 84".

segment.source: A printed version of the Unpacking Guide is attached to the outside front of each unit's shipping crate.
segment.target: A printed version of the Unpacking Guide is attached to the outside front of each unit's shipping crate.

segment.source: Download the 55" Unpacking Guide from the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: Download the 55" Unpacking Guide from the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: Download the 84" version from the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: Download the 84" version from the Microsoft Download Center.
